column2: an A.M. Eatery////I went here for my birthday and didn't have too long of a wait.  There were some board games and bean bag toss outside while we waited (not sure if it's always available).  Service was decent.  I tried the breakfast pot pie which was really good but not mind blowing.  My friends got the pancakes
column4: nothing outstanding).  The waitress recommended the mocha coffee
column6: that was the only thing that I would definitely come back for!  That was one of the best cups of joe I've had in ages!  Snooze is nice
column7: but I don't think it's worth any long wait for.
